name: Gambit by the Flame
desc: When entering the Night, the first character in the current team gains 2 stack(s) of "Conquer." Characters with "Conquer" consume 1 stack of "Conquer" at the end of their turn/extra turn to advance their action by 100%/gain 1 extra turn and increase final DMG dealt by 10%, lasting until the end of their next turn.
